meanings.definition: accomplishers: people who successfully complete tasks or goals
meanings.sent1: The accomplishers in the team finished the project ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent2: She was one of the accomplishers who helped the company reach its sales target.
meanings.sent3: The accomplishers celebrated their success with a pizza party.
meanings.sent4: In the race of life, the accomplishers are the ones who cross the finish line with a smile.
meanings.sent5: The accomplishers stood out with their dedication and hard work.

meanings.definition: accomplishers: those who achieve success or bring about a desired result
meanings.sent1: The accomplishers of the mission were praised for their bravery.
meanings.sent2: As accomplishers of their dreams, they never gave up on their goals.
meanings.sent3: The accomplishers of the treasure hunt found the hidden prize in record time.
meanings.sent4: Like stars in the sky, the accomplishers shine brightly in the darkness of doubt.
meanings.sent5: The accomplishers inspire others with their determination and perseverance.
